entry.title: Russia‚Äôs top diplomat dismisses Azerbaijan‚Äôs demand for corridor through Armenia

media:group.media:title: Russia‚Äôs top diplomat dismisses Azerbaijan‚Äôs demand for corridor through Armenia
media:group.media:description:
üìçRussian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov dismissed Azerbaijan‚Äôs demand for an extraterritorial corridor through Armenia, while also rejecting Armenia‚Äôs position against deploying Russian border guards to the proposed trade route. üìçFormer Armenian Foreign Minister Vartan Oskanian announced the formation of a group to advocate for the right of Armenians forcibly displaced from Nagorno-Karabakh to return. üìçFrance‚Äôs Senate passed a resolution condemning Azerbaijan‚Äôs forceful takeover of Nagorno-Karabakh and calling for sanctions and a fossil fuel embargo on Azerbaijan. üìçThe European Union earmarked another $10 million for its border mission in Armenia.
Credits: Ruptly
